npc_dota_hero_antimage.Name: Anti-Mage
npc_dota_hero_antimage.Short: Slashes his foes with mana-draining attacks

tooltips.Description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
tooltips.Lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
tooltips.Note0: Mana Break has %illusion_percentage%% effect if caused by illusions.

tooltips.Description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
tooltips.Lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
tooltips.Note0: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.

tooltips.ally_Description: Counterspell Ally may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around an allied hero that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead. Any time a spell is reflected by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally, an illusion of Anti-Mage will be created next to the enemy.
tooltips.Description: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.
tooltips.shard_description: Counterspell passively grants an aura that reduces enemy spell damage. The reduction is stronger in close range.
tooltips.Lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Shard: Access Counterspell Ally by toggling auto-cast on Counterspell.

tooltips.Description: Blinks an illusion to the target enemy or location, which attacks for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.

Counterspell Ally may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around an allied hero that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead. Any time a spell is reflected by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally, an illusion of Anti-Mage will be created next to the enemy.
For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
tooltips.Lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
tooltips.Note0: Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.

npc_dota_hero_axe.Name: Axe
npc_dota_hero_axe.Short: Taunts and forces enemies to attack him

tooltips.Description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him at high speed, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
tooltips.scepter_description: Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Must draft Battle Hunger for Scepter upgrade to work.
tooltips.Lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.

tooltips.Description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
tooltips.Note0: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.
tooltips.Lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
tooltips.scepter_description: Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor and grants Axe armor per affected target.

tooltips.Description: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
tooltips.shard_description: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Counter Helix no longer has a cooldown.
tooltips.Note0: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
tooltips.Lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

tooltips.Description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed and armor.
tooltips.Note0: Culling Blade death cannot be prevented with other abilities like Shallow Grave.
tooltips.Lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

talent_2.name: +12% Movement Speed per active Battle Hunger

talent_6.name: +1 Bonus Armor per Culling Blade Stack

npc_dota_hero_bane.Name: Bane
npc_dota_hero_bane.Short: Puts his enemies to sleep, incapacitating them

tooltips.Description: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.
tooltips.Lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

tooltips.Description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
tooltips.Lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
tooltips.shard_description: Reduces cooldown by -3. Causes Brain Sap to become a +550 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for +30%.

tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Hero that drafts Nightmare can continue to attack nightmared units. Bane can also attack even if he didn't draft this ability.
tooltips.Description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack and damage nightmared targets freely with bonus attack speed.
tooltips.Lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
tooltips.Note0: In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
tooltips.Note1: Bane can wake himself from Nightmare.
tooltips.Note2: On cast, replaced with Nightmare End: Ends all ongoing Nightmares on any affected units.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
tooltips.scepter_description: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by -45. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions take +200% incoming damage and immediately die if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.
tooltips.Lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.

npc_dota_hero_bloodseeker.Name: Bloodseeker
npc_dota_hero_bloodseeker.Short: Chases down low health enemies with increased speed

tooltips.Description: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
tooltips.Note0: Damage dealt to Bloodseeker or allies is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
tooltips.Lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
tooltips.shard_description: Bloodrage attacks now deal 30 pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

tooltips.Description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
tooltips.Lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
tooltips.Note0: Total time is a %delay% second delay plus a %abilitycastpoint% second cast time.

tooltips.Description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 80%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
tooltips.Lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
tooltips.Note0: Not triggered by Illusions.
tooltips.Note1: Max movement speed bonus occurs when an enemy's health is at or below %max_bonus_pct%%.
tooltips.Note2: Effects linger for %linger_duration% seconds if a target dies.

tooltips.Description: Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, losing health to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown. Additionally, passively turns all your overheal from your own abilities into an all damage barrier up to 50% of Bloodseeker's Max Health. Barrier amount decays by 0.5% per second.
tooltips.Note0: Damage dealt to Bloodseeker is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.

tooltips.Description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.
tooltips.Lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

npc_dota_hero_crystal_maiden.Name: Crystal Maiden
npc_dota_hero_crystal_maiden.Short: Unleashes a high damage blizzard upon her foes

tooltips.Description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.
tooltips.Lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.
tooltips.Note0: Crystal Nova provides vision in the targeted area for the duration.

tooltips.Description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.
tooltips.Lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.
tooltips.Note0: Frostbite is considered a root.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Shard: Access Crystal Clone by toggling auto-cast on Frostbite.

tooltips.Description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a 1200 radius of Crystal Maiden receive 3x the mana regeneration. Crystal Maiden herself receives 7x the bonus.
tooltips.Lore: Cold temperatures promote the essence of magic, causing Rylai's presence to allow spell usage in abundance.

abilities.name: Crystal Clone
abilities.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_HIDDEN | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_SHOW_IN_GUIDES | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_MOVEMENT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE

tooltips.Description: Slides backward, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a 450 AoE around its place. The Clone can also be destroyed by Crystal Maiden's own spells.
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts NaN seconds.
tooltips.shard_description: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 0% slower during this.\n\nIncreases total number of explosions by undefined%.
tooltips.Lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.
tooltips.Note0: The slow is applied on all enemies in the radius, even if they aren't hit by an explosion (lasts %slow_duration% second).
tooltips.Note1: Explosions occur every %explosion_interval% seconds.
tooltips.scepter_description: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move -75% slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by +20%. Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over +3.5s.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Frostbite must be drafted for Aghanim's Scepter upgrade to work.

tooltips.Description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts 1 seconds.
tooltips.scepter_description: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, increasing damage from Frost Arrows and reducing their regeneration per stack. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal damage per stack and slow in an area around it.
tooltips.Lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
tooltips.Note0: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.

tooltips.Description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back and reveals invisible enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow. Drow Gains Movement Speed for the same duration.
tooltips.Lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1 seconds.
tooltips.Lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.
tooltips.Note0: Arrow base damage pierces magic immunity.
tooltips.Note1: Frost Arrows' damage and slow do not pierce magic immunity.

tooltips.Description: Drow Ranger creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow Ranger additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through except by Drow Ranger. Does not interrupt Multishot when cast

Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility, with allies receiving 50% of the bonus Drow receives. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.
tooltips.scepter_Description: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting up to %split_count% nearby units within a %split_range% range normal attacks that deal reduced damage.
tooltips.Lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
tooltips.Note0: Marksmanship procs have true strike.
tooltips.scepter_description: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting up to 0 nearby units within a 375 range normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

npc_dota_hero_earthshaker.Name: Earthshaker
npc_dota_hero_earthshaker.Short: Disrupts enemy team with his chain stuns

tooltips.Description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
tooltips.Lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
tooltips.Note0: Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
tooltips.Note1: Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
tooltips.shard_description: Reduces Fissure cooldown and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for a shortened duration.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Requires drafting Aftershock for Shard upgrade to work.

tooltips.scepter_description: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.
tooltips.Description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 100 bonus attack range on the next attack.
tooltips.Lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
tooltips.Note0: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.

tooltips.Description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
tooltips.Lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
tooltips.Note0: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

tooltips.Description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
tooltips.Lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

npc_dota_hero_juggernaut.Name: Juggernaut
npc_dota_hero_juggernaut.Short: Slices through his enemies with precise strikes

tooltips.Description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%, and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Juggernaut deals damage in an interval equal to 2.0x his attack speed \n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
tooltips.shard_description: Increases Blade Fury radius, and slows enemies by %bonus_movement_slow%%.
tooltips.Lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
tooltips.Note0: You can use items during Blade Fury.
tooltips.Note1: Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.

tooltips.Description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 325 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
tooltips.Lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
tooltips.Note0: The Healing Ward can be controlled.
tooltips.Note1: Multiple Healing Wards do not stack.

tooltips.Description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
tooltips.Lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

tooltips.Description: Performs a short Omnislash for 1 seconds.

Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
tooltips.Lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
tooltips.Note0: You can use items during Omnislash.

npc_dota_hero_mirana.Name: Mirana
npc_dota_hero_mirana.Short: Stuns enemies with precise arrows from afar

tooltips.Description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 650 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.
tooltips.Lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
tooltips.Note0: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
tooltips.Note1: Starstorm cannot hit invisible units.
tooltips.Note2: Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

tooltips.Description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 2.6 seconds, with bonus damage up to 150 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
tooltips.scepter_description: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.
tooltips.Lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
tooltips.Note0: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
tooltips.Note1: Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

tooltips.Description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 4 seconds.
tooltips.shard_description:
Upon landing, launches a projectile along Sagan's leap path, dealing damage and slowing units affected and guarantees them to be hit with a secondary Starstorm if that spell is cast. Leap does not break Moonlight Shadow invisibility.

 Can be put on alt-cast to choose the distance and facing direction of the jump. 

Grants 1 bonus charge(s).
tooltips.Lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.

tooltips.Description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
tooltips.Lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
tooltips.Note0: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.

npc_dota_hero_nevermore.Name: Shadow Fiend
npc_dota_hero_nevermore.Short: Unleashes the souls of fallen enemies for damage

tooltips.Description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
tooltips.Lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
tooltips.Note0: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

tooltips.Description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Shadowraze has 3 charges and uses the mid-range Shadowraze.
tooltips.Lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
tooltips.Note0: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

tooltips.Description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
tooltips.Lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
tooltips.Note0: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

tooltips.Description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 30.0% of them from bondage.
tooltips.shard_description: Shadow Fiend gains an extra soul per kill. Shadow Fiend can consume a soul per attack to deal critical damage and fear the target.
tooltips.scepter_description: Increases max souls.
tooltips.Lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
tooltips.Note0: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.

tooltips.Description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies. Every enemy hero killed nearby further improves armor reduction by 2 for 20s.
tooltips.shard_description: Lowers nearby enemy magic resistance by 14%.
tooltips.Lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
tooltips.Note0: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.

tooltips.Description: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.7 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.15. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery. \n\n Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
tooltips.scepter_description: Reduces cooldown and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Must draft Necromastery to do damage.
tooltips.Lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
tooltips.Note0: One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every %requiem_soul_conversion% soul in his possession.
tooltips.Note1: Fear and movement slow do not apply if the Requiem was released on death.

npc_dota_hero_morphling.Name: Morphling
npc_dota_hero_morphling.Short: Rides the waves to flank enemies

tooltips.Description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
tooltips.Lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

tooltips.Description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. Passively grants bonus Agility. \n\n Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.
tooltips.shard_description: Increases bonus Agility.
tooltips.Lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
tooltips.Note0: Projectile moves at %projectile_speed% speed.

tooltips.Description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. Passively grants bonus Strength. \n\n Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.
tooltips.shard_description: Increases bonus Strength.
tooltips.Lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
tooltips.Note0: Projectile moves at %projectile_speed% speed.

tooltips.Description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
tooltips.shard_description: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned.
tooltips.Lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
tooltips.Note0: Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
tooltips.Note1: Leveling up Agility Gain will also level up Strength Gain.

tooltips.Description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
tooltips.shard_description: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned.
tooltips.Lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
tooltips.Note0: Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
tooltips.Note1: Leveling up Strength Gain will also level up Agility Gain.

tooltips.Description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
tooltips.scepter_description: Adds an alt-cast to Morph. When enabled, a strong illusion is created of the target hero that can cast all of the hero's basic abilities. If the illusion is alive when Morphling toggles the ability, he will take the place of the illusion, destroying it.
tooltips.Lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
tooltips.Note0: You can't target yourself with Morph.
tooltips.Note1: Morph won't copy Shard/Scepter abilities unless Morphling owns the respective item.

npc_dota_hero_phantom_lancer.Name: Phantom Lancer
npc_dota_hero_phantom_lancer.Short: Creates illusions of himself to trick or attack foes

tooltips.Description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
tooltips.scepter_description: Spirit Lance bounces twice on enemies, prioritizing Heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage.
tooltips.Lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
tooltips.Note0: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

tooltips.Description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 500% bonus damage and deals -80% less damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
tooltips.Lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
tooltips.Note0: This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispel debuffs.
tooltips.Note1: Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.
tooltips.Note2: Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.

tooltips.Description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
tooltips.Lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
tooltips.Note0: If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.
tooltips.Note1: Rush movement speed is %bonus_speed%.

tooltips.Description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.
tooltips.shard_description: Adds an active ability to Juxtapose. Renders Phantom Lancer invisible for up to 8 seconds while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies. His movement speed is increased by 15% during this invisibility.
tooltips.Lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
tooltips.Note0: Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.

npc_dota_hero_puck.Name: Puck
npc_dota_hero_puck.Short: Orbs to enemies and silences them

tooltips.Description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: For Ability Draft only, Illusory Orb ability swaps with Ethereal Jaunt while the orb is in flight.
tooltips.Lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
tooltips.Note0: The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.
tooltips.Note1: Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

tooltips.Description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
tooltips.scepter_description: Waning Rift now has %scepter_radius% radius and range and knocks enemies back %scepter_pushback% distance over %scepter_pushback_duration% seconds (non-interrupting). Reveals invisible enemy units and wards in the area for %scepter_vision_duration% seconds.
tooltips.Lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
tooltips.shard_description: Puck's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range every time it phase shifts.
tooltips.Lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
tooltips.Note0: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
tooltips.Note1: Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
tooltips.Note2: Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.

tooltips.Description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.

Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
tooltips.scepter_Description: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked at a rate equal to %attack_rate_pct%% of Puck's attack rate. The attacks continue while the target is stunned if they break the Dream Coil.
tooltips.Lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
tooltips.scepter_description: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked at a rate equal to +90% of Puck's attack rate. The attacks continue while the target is stunned if they break the Dream Coil.

npc_dota_hero_pudge.Name: Pudge
npc_dota_hero_pudge.Short: Hooks and pulls enemies towards him

tooltips.Description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
tooltips.Lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
tooltips.Note0: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
tooltips.Note1: Meat Hook hits invisible units.
tooltips.Note2: Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, ancient units and Roshan.
tooltips.Note3: Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
tooltips.Note4: Meat Hook can hit and drag runes to Pudge, refunding the Hook's mana cost.

tooltips.Description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
tooltips.scepter_description: Increases Rot radius and damage, and causes it to reduce enemy health regen.
tooltips.Lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
tooltips.Note0: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling.
tooltips.Note1: Rot hits invisible units.
tooltips.Note2: If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.
tooltips.Note3: Rot self-damage is non-lethal.

tooltips.Description: Gives Pudge damage block against all sources. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
tooltips.Lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'

tooltips.Description: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.
tooltips.Lore: Allies emerge forever changed.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of 75 units, up to a minimum of 125 range. Lasts longer on creeps.
tooltips.shard_description: Decreases cooldown, and allows targeting an ally with bonus cast range to swallow them and heal them for a percentage of their max health per second.
tooltips.Lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
tooltips.Note0: If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.

talent_8.name: x1.5x Flesh Heap Stack Str and Damage Block bonuses

npc_dota_hero_razor.Name: Razor
npc_dota_hero_razor.Short: Steals enemy damage to add to his own

tooltips.Description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
tooltips.Lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

tooltips.Description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
tooltips.shard_Description: Increases Cast Range. Allows Static Link to be put on alt-cast to pull Razor and his Target towards at each other at a speed of %pull_speed%.
tooltips.Lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
tooltips.Note0: The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes %drain_range_buffer% units greater than Static Link's cast range.
tooltips.shard_description: Increases Cast Range. Allows Static Link to be put on alt-cast to pull Razor and his Target towards at each other at a speed of +100.

tooltips.Description: Passively increases Razor's movement speed. There's a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, prioritizing the unit type of the attacker, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
tooltips.Lore: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.

tooltips.Description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
tooltips.scepter_description: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.
tooltips.Lore: Ride the lightning.
tooltips.Note0: Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.
tooltips.Note1: Eye of the Storm will prioritize striking static linked heroes.
tooltips.Note2: Successive casts of Eye of the Storm will stack.

talent_4.name: Static Link Steals 1 Armor per Second

talent_6.name: --0.10s Eye of the Storm Strike Interval

talent_7.name: Creates A Second Plasma Field Delayed By 0.8s

npc_dota_hero_sand_king.Name: Sand King
npc_dota_hero_sand_king.Short: Burrows to stun and slow enemies

tooltips.Description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit.
tooltips.scepter_description: Increases its cast range. Burrowstrike can be put on autocast to retreat underground for up to 2 seconds, becoming invulnerable and powering up burrowstrike. When that duration is over, Burrowstrike deals up to 2x Burrowstrike damage, depending on the duration of time spent underground.
tooltips.Lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

tooltips.Description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision. The sandstorm follows Sand King at 100 units per second. The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
tooltips.scepter_description: Every 0.2s, +2 Burrowstrike spines are created at random locations, each measuring +10% of the Sand Storm's current radius, that apply Burrowstrike damage and stun to enemies hit.
tooltips.Lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
tooltips.Note0: Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.
tooltips.Note1: Sand King briefly becomes visible upon attacking or using spells while in Sand Storm. Sand King will become invisible again in %fade_delay% seconds.

tooltips.Description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.
tooltips.Lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

tooltips.Description: After a cast point of %abilitycastpoint% seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
tooltips.shard_description: Increases Epicenter Pulse damage, and every 3.5s causes a small single Epicenter Pulse around Sand King.
tooltips.Lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
tooltips.Note0: The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.

npc_dota_hero_storm_spirit.Name: Storm Spirit
npc_dota_hero_storm_spirit.Short: Zips across the map to engage in fights

tooltips.Description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
tooltips.Lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
tooltips.Note0: Remnants take %static_remnant_delay% second to materialize after the spell is cast.
tooltips.Note1: Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.
tooltips.Note2: The explosion actually hits units in a %static_remnant_damage_radius% radius, but will only be triggered in %static_remnant_radius%.

tooltips.Description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
tooltips.scepter_description: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.
tooltips.Lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.

tooltips.Description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
tooltips.shard_description: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and nearby allied heroes 3 Overload charges. Provides bonus Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.
tooltips.Lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
tooltips.Note0: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.
tooltips.Note1: Overload charges do not stack.

tooltips.Description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25+7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+0.65% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
tooltips.Lore: The Storm is coming in.
tooltips.Note0: Abilities and items can be used while traveling.
tooltips.Note1: This ability will destroy trees.
tooltips.Note2: Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

talent_8.name: 500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning

npc_dota_hero_sven.Name: Sven
npc_dota_hero_sven.Short: Cleaves down enemies with his incredible strength

tooltips.Description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
tooltips.scepter_description: Increases cast range and applies a basic dispel on the target. Can be cast on invulnerable targets. If alt-cast, it deals an additional 180 damage and Sven travels with the Storm Hammer.
tooltips.Lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.

tooltips.Description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack. Passively grants bonus Strength.
tooltips.Lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

tooltips.shard_description: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants 6 armor and 3% movement speed to all allies near Sven.
tooltips.Description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 10 seconds.
tooltips.Lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!

tooltips.Description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage and slow resistance for 35 seconds.
tooltips.Lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
tooltips.Note0: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.

npc_dota_hero_tiny.Name: Tiny
npc_dota_hero_tiny.Short: Grows in size and strength as battle ensues

tooltips.Description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 2x damage to units being tossed.
tooltips.Lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

tooltips.Description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
tooltips.Lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
tooltips.Note0: You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.
tooltips.Note1: Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.
tooltips.Note2: Debuff Immune units can be targeted but cannot be tossed.
tooltips.tree_Description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
tooltips.tree_shard_Description: Increases damage dealt by thrown trees by %bonus_bonus_damage%.
tooltips.tree_Lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.

tooltips.lore: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow.
tooltips.Description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
tooltips.shard_description: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Scepter: Access Tree Volley by toggling auto-cast on Tree Grab.
tooltips.Note0: The cooldown begins when the tree is thrown.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
tooltips.Lore: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.

tooltips.Description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
tooltips.Lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

npc_dota_hero_vengefulspirit.Name: Vengeful Spirit
npc_dota_hero_vengefulspirit.Short: Can swap herself with any nearby hero

tooltips.Description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
tooltips.shard_description: Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes, within 75% of Magic Missile's current cast range from the first target.
tooltips.Lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.

tooltips.Description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the total attack damage and armor of enemies, and giving vision of the path ahead.
tooltips.Lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.

tooltips.Description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.
tooltips.scepter_description: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes full damage and can cast all of her spells. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her. Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.
tooltips.Lore: Although they may not share her undying passion for revenge, allies do draw on her fanaticism in combat.

tooltips.Description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Vengeful Spirit and allied swapped units gain a barrier equal to the damage dealt.
tooltips.Lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.
tooltips.Note0: Works on Spell Immune units.
tooltips.Note1: Trees near Vengeful Spirit and the target will be destroyed when the spell is cast.
tooltips.Note2: Channeling spells are interrupted by Nether Swap.

talent_6.name: Wave Of Terror Steals 20% Of Reduced Damage And Armor

npc_dota_hero_windrunner.Name: Windranger
npc_dota_hero_windrunner.Short: Fires swift flurry of arrows at a single target

tooltips.Description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.6.
tooltips.Lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
tooltips.Note0: This spell can shackle two enemies together, stunning them both.
tooltips.Note1: Can shackle the target to an enemy unit or tree at most 575 behind the target.
tooltips.Note2: Shackleshot can be disjointed.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which slows and deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage and slow power is reduced.
tooltips.Lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.
tooltips.Note0: Powershot will destroy trees in its area of effect.

tooltips.Description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks.
tooltips.scepter_description: Windrun reduces physical damage taken by -45%, and grants invisibility that is not broken by attacking or casting spells.
tooltips.Lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
tooltips.Note0: Activating Windrun will evade incoming projectiles.

tooltips.Lore: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.
tooltips.Description: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.

Windranger channels the wind to gain 350 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
tooltips.Lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
tooltips.Note0: Issuing a Hold Position command will pause Windranger's attacks.
tooltips.Note1: Windranger can move while attacking.

talent_8.name: Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by 18s

npc_dota_hero_zuus.Name: Zeus
npc_dota_hero_zuus.Short: Strikes enemies near and far with lightning

tooltips.Description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal a base damage and a percentage of their current health.
tooltips.Lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Shard: Lightning Hands is hidden in the ability panel when Shard is acquired, but can be enabled and disabled by activating the Alternate Cast on Arc Lightning.

tooltips.Description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range. Deals 100% more damage to creeps.
tooltips.Lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
tooltips.Note0: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

tooltips.Description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.
Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
tooltips.Note0: Grants %cloud_bounty_tooltip% gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
tooltips.Note1: Affects the closest enemy unit with strikes from Zeus's current level of Lightning Bolt.
tooltips.Note2: Towers and creeps do half damage to the Nimbus.
tooltips.lore: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.

tooltips.Description: Zeus gains bonus attack range and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.

Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be. Does a flat amount of damage and additional damage based on the max health of the target.\n\nThundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
tooltips.Lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Nimbus requires Lightning Bolt to be drafted for damage.

talent_5.name: +6% Arc Lightning Current Health As Damage

npc_dota_hero_kunkka.Name: Kunkka
npc_dota_hero_kunkka.Short: Disrupts enemy positioning and disables them

tooltips.Description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
tooltips.Lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
tooltips.Note0: The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies and provides vision in fog of war.
tooltips.Note1: Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Scepter: Access Torrent Storm by toggling auto-cast on Torrent.
tooltips.storm_Description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area within %torrent_max_distance% range of the target position once every %torrent_interval% for %torrent_duration% seconds.
tooltips.storm_Lore: A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.

tooltips.Description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
tooltips.Lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

tooltips.Description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkkoiza can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
tooltips.Lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
tooltips.Note1: Interrupts channeling spells.

tooltips.Description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area within 1100 range of the target position once every 0.25 for 4.0 seconds.
tooltips.Lore: A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.

tooltips.Description: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
tooltips.Lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
tooltips.Note0: Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
tooltips.Note1: Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
tooltips.Note2: The boat has a movement speed of %ghostship_speed%.

talent_2.name: +25% X Marks the Spot Move Speed

npc_dota_hero_lina.Name: Lina
npc_dota_hero_lina.Short: Increases attack and speed with every spell

tooltips.Description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path and burns them over time.
tooltips.Lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
tooltips.Note0: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.

tooltips.Description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
tooltips.Lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
tooltips.Note0: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

tooltips.Description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 18 seconds.
tooltips.shard_description: Lina's abilities deal %shard_bonus_spell_damage% more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.
tooltips.Lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
tooltips.Note0: Duration refreshes each time an opponent is hit with a spell.
tooltips.Note1: Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.

tooltips.Lore: A natural defense equally suited to keeping anything from unwanted sisters to snarling hellbeasts at bay.
tooltips.Description: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.
Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage. Temporarily Supercharges Lina giving her 10 stacks of Fiery Soul.
tooltips.Lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
tooltips.Note0: Laguna Blade has a %damage_delay% delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

talent_8.name: +150% Crit On Targets Affected By Dragon Slave

npc_dota_hero_lich.Name: Lich
npc_dota_hero_lich.Short: Unleashes a powerful attack that bounces between enemies

tooltips.Description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage.
tooltips.Lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.

tooltips.Description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.
tooltips.Lore: First conceived of to protect him in his mortal years, the frost magic that Ethreain weaves around himself has only grown colder with time.
tooltips.Note0: Spell-immune enemies are not affected by the damage or slow.
tooltips.Note1: Frost Shield can be cast on buildings.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana. If cast on a creep lasts 2x longer and deals 250 damage per second.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: If Scepter is acquired, casting other channeled abilities or abilities that take your hero out of the world will stop Sinister Gaze.
tooltips.Lore: Mind the cold...
tooltips.scepter_description: Sinister Gaze becomes an Area of Effect ability, affecting units within a radius of +400 in the target area. Sinister Gaze allows Lich to cast other abilities while channeling it.

tooltips.Description:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Can take 5 hero hits or 10 creep hits and when destroyed it will create a Frost Blast around it.

Chain Frost can be cast on the Spire and can bounce to the Spire if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire. Each Frost Shield tick will heal the spire by 1 hero attack.
Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.
tooltips.Lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
tooltips.Note0: Chain Frost cannot be disjointed.
tooltips.Note1: Chain Frost has a movement speed of %projectile_speed%.
tooltips.Note2: Chain Frost doesn't bounce to Zombies.

npc_dota_hero_lion.Name: Lion
npc_dota_hero_lion.Short: Steals enemy mana to fuel his own abilities

tooltips.Description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
tooltips.Lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
tooltips.Note0: The spikes move at %speed% units per second.

tooltips.Description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
tooltips.Lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
tooltips.Note0: Instantly destroys illusions.
tooltips.Note1: The target will have a base movement speed of %movespeed%, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Channels magical energy, taking mana and slowing enemies over time, and dealing damage equal to 100% of mana stolen. Can target allies to give them mana and movement speed at a 50% rate.
tooltips.shard_description: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to 2 additional enemies and increases break distance. Lion becomes Debuff Immune with +60% magic resistance while channeling.
tooltips.Lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
tooltips.Note0: Instantly destroys illusions and prevents heroes from going invisible.

tooltips.Description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
tooltips.scepter_description: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.
tooltips.Lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
tooltips.Note0: Finger of Death has a %damage_delay% delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
tooltips.Note1: Finger of Death only gains damage if the enemy hero dies within %grace_period% seconds of being affected by Finger of Death.

talent_4.name: +70 Max Health Per Finger of Death Kill

talent_5.name: +20 Finger of Death Damage Per Kill

npc_dota_hero_shadow_shaman.Name: Shadow Shaman
npc_dota_hero_shadow_shaman.Short: Summons powerful serpent wards to deal damage

tooltips.Description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
tooltips.Lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
tooltips.Note0: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.

tooltips.Description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities and amplifying the damage they receive.
tooltips.Lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
tooltips.Note0: Instantly destroys illusions.
tooltips.Note1: The target will have a base movement speed of %movespeed%, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.
tooltips.shard_description: Shackles creates 4 Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 75. Serpent wards lasts 6 seconds.
tooltips.Lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.

tooltips.Description: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.
tooltips.scepter_description: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage.
tooltips.Lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.

npc_dota_hero_slardar.Name: Slardar
npc_dota_hero_slardar.Short: Chases down his enemies to weaken and bash them

tooltips.Description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration and armor while in a puddle or river.
tooltips.scepter_description: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle or in the river.
tooltips.Lore: As Slardar has made the transition from the Deeps, it has been necessary to use his powerful tail for sprinting instead of swimming.
tooltips.Note0: Activating this skill doesn't interrupt channeling abilities.

tooltips.Description: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.
tooltips.scepter_description: Increases Slithereen Crush puddle radius and duration.
tooltips.shard_description: Increases Slithereen Crush radius, and causes it to apply Corrosive Haze for a short time to units affected.
tooltips.Lore: A swift crush of might and water breaks even the toughest of defenses.

tooltips.Description: After 3 attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps. Passively grants bonus damage to Slardar while he's in water.
tooltips.Lore: Thieves of the wealth of the Deep Ones meet the brutality of the Slithereen Guard in melee combat.
tooltips.Note0: Does not stack with Skull Basher.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: In Ability Draft, does stack with Skull Basher.

tooltips.Description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.
tooltips.Lore: Even the strongest armor counts for little when left to the brine of the sea.

npc_dota_hero_tidehunter.Name: Tidehunter
npc_dota_hero_tidehunter.Short: Durable hero who shrugs off enemy damage

tooltips.Description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
tooltips.Lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.
tooltips.scepter_description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

tooltips.Description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
tooltips.Lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.
tooltips.Note0: Only damage from player owned sources is counted towards debuff removal.
tooltips.Note1: The counter will reset if no player owned damage is taken for %damage_reset_interval% seconds.
tooltips.Note2: Kraken Shell removes most debuffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

tooltips.Description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
tooltips.shard_description: Anchor Smash now affects buildings and has increased damage and reduced cooldown.
tooltips.Lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.
tooltips.Note0: Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.

tooltips.Description: Tidehunter attaches a heavy anchor to an enemy hero. The hero is leashed while attached to the anchor. Attempting to move more than 350 units away from the anchor forces the hero to 100 move speed, dragging the anchor behind them. The anchor can be destroyed with 4 hero attacks.
Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
tooltips.Lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.
tooltips.Note0: Ravage will hit invisible units.
tooltips.Note1: Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of %speed%.

talent_6.name: +4 Kraken Shell Damage Block per Anchor Smash Kill

talent_8.name: 50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack

npc_dota_hero_witch_doctor.Name: Witch Doctor
npc_dota_hero_witch_doctor.Short: Channels a high damage death ward

tooltips.Description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals 150% damage to creeps.
tooltips.Lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
tooltips.Note0: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

tooltips.Description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
tooltips.Lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
tooltips.Note0: Healing is done in %heal_interval% second intervals.
tooltips.Note1: Can heal Spell Immune units.

tooltips.Description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
tooltips.Lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
tooltips.Note0: If an affected hero's health has increased above the amount they had when Maledict was cast, the burst damage will be 0.

tooltips.Description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.
CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds. Death Ward has 50% bonus accuracy.
tooltips.scepter_description: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.
tooltips.Lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
tooltips.Note0: The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
tooltips.Note1: The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.
tooltips.Note2: Death Ward attacks once every 0.22 seconds.

npc_dota_hero_riki.Name: Riki
npc_dota_hero_riki.Short: Remains permanently invisible until the moment to strike

tooltips.Description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.
tooltips.Lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.
tooltips.Note0: Can be cast during Tricks of the Trade.
tooltips.Note1: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.
tooltips.shard_description: Enemies caught in the smoke screen have their armor reduced by 5 and cannot be targeted by their allies.

tooltips.Description: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
tooltips.Lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.
tooltips.Note0: Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.
tooltips.Note1: Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.
tooltips.Note2: You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him. While phased out his attack damage is reduced, but his Agility greatly increases.
tooltips.scepter_description: Increases cast range, number of attacks and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.  Each attack hits an additional target.
tooltips.Lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
tooltips.Note0: Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.

tooltips.Description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. Bonus damage is doubled against non-hero units. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible. Grants bonus experience for hero kills and assists.
tooltips.Lore: Riki comes for you.
tooltips.Note0: Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
tooltips.Note1: Riki cannot Backstab buildings or Tormentors.

talent_3.name: +30% Tricks of the Trade Agility Increase

talent_8.name: Tricks of the Trade Applies a Basic Dispel

npc_dota_hero_enigma.Name: Enigma
npc_dota_hero_enigma.Short: Traps and damages enemies in a black hole

tooltips.Description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2.0 seconds.
tooltips.Lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.
tooltips.shard_description: Increases Malefice stun duration by 0.35s and creates an Eidolon next to the target every instance of Malefice stun. These Eidolons will not multiply further.

tooltips.Description: Summons three fragments of Enigma himself at the cost of health.  The eidolons health is increased by 4% of Enigma's current health. These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
tooltips.Lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.

tooltips.Description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, dealing 5 + a percentage of the enemies current HP as damage.
tooltips.Lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
tooltips.Note0: This ability destroys trees in its area.
tooltips.Note1: Multiple instances of Midnight Pulse do not stack.

tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
tooltips.scepter_description: Black Hole deals additional damage equivalent to 3.5% of the unit's Max Health per second and does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.
tooltips.Lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.

npc_dota_hero_tinker.Name: Tinker
npc_dota_hero_tinker.Short: Demolishes his enemies with swarms of machines

tooltips.Description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.
tooltips.scepter_description: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +200 cast range and reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by 10% (stacking) if it's a hero. The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.
tooltips.Lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.

tooltips.Description: Launches rockets at the nearest visible heroes within 1500 range.
tooltips.Lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.

tooltips.Description: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.
Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 3 seconds.

tooltips.Lore: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'
tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.

tooltips.abilitydraft_note: For abilities with charges, a single charge of the ability will be added everytime Rearm is cast.
tooltips.Description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities and grants bonus magic resistance for 4 seconds.
tooltips.Lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
tooltips.Note0: Rearm works on all items except Aeon Disk, Arcane Boots, Black King Bar, Hand of Midas, Helm of the Dominator, Helm of the Overlord, Linken's Sphere, Meteor Hammer, Pipe of Insight, Refresher Orb, Revenant's Brooch (passive ability), and all neutral items.

npc_dota_hero_sniper.Name: Sniper
npc_dota_hero_sniper.Short: Picks off his enemies from afar

tooltips.Description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every %abilitychargerestoretime% seconds.
tooltips.Lore: Kardel's modular rifle also fires incendiary rounds, useful for assaulting entrenched locations.
tooltips.Note0: Damage is dealt 11 times, immediately at spell effect then every second.
tooltips.Note1: Does not damage buildings.
tooltips.Note2: Provides vision in the targeted area.

tooltips.Description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Headshots briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed by -100%.
tooltips.Lore: Taking potshots at steepstalkers in his childhood has been thoroughly refined into perfect leads on enemy combatants.
tooltips.Note0: Works on allied creeps.

tooltips.Description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to provide 100% Headshot chance and an additional 200 attack range bonus. Slows you by 45, 40, 35, 30% for the duration.
tooltips.Lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.

tooltips.Description: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.

Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals Sniper's attack damage plus bonus damage at long range and mini-stuns the target. Whenever Sniper kills an enemy hero, Assassinate is refreshed.
tooltips.scepter_description: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and stun the enemy target.
tooltips.Lore: In order to fulfill the prophecy and return to his home town, Kardel must make another shot as perfect as the one on the day of his ancient test.
tooltips.Note0: Crosshair effect is only visible to allies.
tooltips.Note1: Invisibility doesn't disjoint the projectile.

npc_dota_hero_necrolyte.Name: Necrophos
npc_dota_hero_necrolyte.Short: Damages enemies and heals allies simultaneously

tooltips.Description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
tooltips.Lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
tooltips.Note0: Death Pulse can't be disjointed.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Shard: Access Death Seeker by toggling auto-cast on Death Pulse.

tooltips.Description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
tooltips.abilitydraft_note: Ghost Shroud is removed as soon as you cast any magic immune spells (Bladefury, Rage, etc.)
tooltips.scepter_description: Reduces Ghost Shroud cooldown.
tooltips.Lore: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.
